headline: RTX Defense Wins And Tests Meet Valuation Questions For Investors
summary: Raytheon, part of RTX, recently completed a successful ballistic flight test for the U.S. Army's Next Generation Short Range Interceptor, a key step toward replacing legacy air defense systems. The company secured a $1.025b contract modification for LTAMDS radar systems, expanding its role in next generation air and missile defense. Raytheon also won a $197m contract to supply advanced reconnaissance systems to Poland, reinforcing its presence in European defense programs. DARPA selected...

headline: Defense Behemoths: Winners and Loser During Q4 Earnings Cycle

headline: RTX's Raytheon completes successful ballistic test for U.S. Army's Next Generation Short Range Interceptor
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has successfully completed a ballistic test for the U.S. Army's Next Generation Short Range Interceptor (NGSRI), which will replace the Stinger® surface-to-air missile.

raw.headline: RTX's Raytheon completes successful ballistic test for U.S. Army's Next Generation Short Range Interceptor
raw.summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has successfully completed a ballistic test for the U.S. Army's Next Generation Short Range Interceptor (NGSRI), which will replace the Stinger® surface-to-air missile.

headline: The Tightrope for Defense Contractors: Satisfying Investors and President Trump
summary: Major weapons makers are defending dividends as the Pentagon pressures them to invest more in factories.

headline: RTX's Raytheon selected by DARPA to develop advanced maritime defense technologies
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has been selected by the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) to develop an advanced sensing and targeting system that will help defend vulnerable commercial shipping and naval logistics vessels against emerging threats such as unmanned surface vehicles (USVs).
